() => { const managerInfo = (manager => {`
${manager.name}
Manager
ID: ${manager.id}
Email: ${manager.email}
Office number: ${manager.OfficeNumber}
` }).join('') const engineerInfo = (engineer => {`
${engineer.name}
Engineer
ID: ${engineer.id}
Email: ${engineer.email}
Github: ${engineer.Github}
` }).join(''); const internInfo = (intern => {`
${intern.name}
Intern
ID: ${intern.id}
Email: ${intern.email}
Github: ${intern.Github}
` }).join(''); }
